content: Open QA. Music & musicians. Be brief.
Tell me briefly how & where carols came into existence.

chosen: Carols were first sung in England in the 16th century, and they were originally religious songs that were performed in churches. Over time, carols became more secular, and they were often sung in homes and other places of worship. In the 19th century, carols began to be written for Christmas, and they have since become a popular part of the holiday season.
rejected: Carols were first sung in England hundreds of years ago. They were performed by groups of people going from house to house, singing songs and collecting money for the poor. The tradition of caroling was started by the Catholic Church, which wanted to bring joy and hope to people who were suffering during the winter months.
